author: eptwts
text:
thought i'd test if i've still got the magic touch when it comes to shortform content...

edited a tiktok in 10 minutes

posted it on a fresh account, ZERO warming up (sorry @jackfriks)

120k views 8hrs later, prob gonna hit a milly

now it's time to send these leads to an email list & start shilling some offers

the game is too easy
